meanings.definition: Not limited to one person or group
meanings.sent1: The club had a nonexclusive membership policy, allowing anyone to join.
meanings.sent2: The nonexclusive invitation was extended to all students in the school.
meanings.sent3: It was a nonexclusive party, so everyone was welcome to attend.
meanings.sent4: Her nonexclusive approach to friendships made her popular with everyone.
meanings.sent5: The nonexclusive nature of the event made it a huge success.

meanings.sent1: The nonexclusive seating arrangement meant that friends could sit together.
meanings.sent2: The nonexclusive policy ensured that everyone had a chance to participate.
meanings.sent3: The nonexclusive attitude of the team fostered a sense of inclusivity.
meanings.sent4: Her nonexclusive leadership style encouraged collaboration among team members.
meanings.sent5: The nonexclusive approach to decision-making led to innovative solutions.

meanings.definition: Not restricted to a single entity
meanings.sent1: The nonexclusive contract allowed the company to work with multiple partners.
meanings.sent2: The nonexclusive distribution rights enabled the product to reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: The nonexclusive agreement opened up new opportunities for growth.
meanings.sent4: His nonexclusive mindset led to diverse business ventures.
meanings.sent5: The nonexclusive licensing deal expanded the brand's reach.
